meanings.definition: The act or result of applying paint to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The paintwork on the walls brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully inspected the paintwork on the fence.
meanings.sent3: The paintwork on the car looked like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a masterpiece, the paintwork telling a story of its own.
meanings.sent5: The fresh paintwork smelled of creativity and new beginnings.

meanings.definition: The painted surface of an object or structure.
meanings.sent1: The old house had peeling paintwork on its exterior.
meanings.sent2: The intricate paintwork on the vase showcased delicate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The paintwork on the door seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The paintwork on the bridge mirrored the colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The glossy paintwork on the car gleamed under the streetlights.
